mixer.introduction: Did you know that some people can easily read a word with mixed-up letters as long as the first and last letters stay in place?
mixer.instruction: Load a text file (.txt) and then use the big button to mix the words.
mixer.cta: See if you can do it too!

pesel.introduction: Don’t know what to do with yourself? The weather outside is gloomy and rainy? We’ve got a solution for you — check the validity of a PESEL number.
pesel.instruction: Enter the number below and use the big button to verify it.

apiLab.introduction: Time to roll up your sleeves and play with data. In the API Lab, you can search and edit entries without limits.
